product_name: The North Face Single-Track GTX XCR II Cross-Training Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and responsive, The North Face Single Track GTX XCR II women's trail-running shoes offer solid footing for outdoor pursuits on rough, uneven terrain. GORE-TEX(R) Extended Comfort Range uppers and linings are waterproof and breathable to keep water out and let your feet stay cool, dry and comfortable. Tongue scree collars help keep pesky trail debris out. CRADLE(TM) technology naturally absorbs impact, stabilizes foot and encourages an anatomically correct strike. 10mm heel-to-toe drop offers a low-profile design with ample shock absorption in key areas. Cushioning, dual-density EVA midsoles provide lightweight, neutral support. Thermoplastic urethane plates in forefeet provide side-to-side stability and protection against stone bruising. Sticky rubber outsoles on The North Face Single-Track GTX XCR II running shoes provide excellent traction for off-road pursuits. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and responsive, The North Face Single Track GTX XCR II women's trail-running shoes offer solid footing for outdoor pursuits on rough, uneven terrain.
